    HourOfWeekSpan(HourOfWeek startHourOfWeek, HourOfWeek endHourOfWeekInclusive, ZoneId timeZone)
    Creates and HourOfWeekSpan, where the start hour of the week does not have to be less than the end hour of the week, and wrapping from sunday to monday is supported.
